DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study examine whether properly fit support bra females improve quality life post-sternotomy . Specifically , support bra reduce discomfort , pain wound dehiscence .
DOC.brief_title: Use Support Bra Reduce Pain Improve Surgical Healing Women Undergoing Sternotomy Cardiac Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomize one arm study . One group fit support bra ask wear bra 24 hour day 6 week post-course . They submit 3 questionnaire ( hospital discharge , 3 week post-op 6 week post-op visit surgeon . They diary 6 week period : pain , comfort , wound heal . The group bra arm also measure breast size submit 3 questionnaire ( interval ) ask diary 6 week post-op course : pain , comfort , wound heal . Chronic pain quality life marker assess 6month 1 year follow-up telephone call questionnaire .
